casebody.data:
Bradley ARNOLD and Diane Arnold, Plaintiffs-Appellants,
v.
Valerie Lynn HABER, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 156820
COA: 338616 Supreme Court of Michigan. April 3, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the November 8, 2017 order of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the question presented should be reviewed by this Court.

I, Larry S. Royster, Clerk of the Michigan Supreme Court, certify that the foregoing is a true and complete copy of the order entered at the direction of the Court.
